data.title: Jasper Gervais
authors: Contributors to Elsie Silver Universe Wiki
data.meta_description: Jasper Gervais is the male protagonist of Powerless, and is married to Sloane Winthrop. He blames himself for his sister's death. His father left them afterwards & started a new family. He lived in his car before Beau invited him to Wishing Well Ranch to live. Sloane's father forbid them from...
data.text:
Jasper Gervais is the male protagonist of Powerless, and is married to Sloane Winthrop.
